interpretation:
The "control knobs" card is all about taking charge and making adjustments to achieve the desired outcome. This emoji suggests that you have the power to control the situation at hand. Trust your instincts and make the necessary tweaks to achieve success. This card also reminds us to take a step back and evaluate our situation objectively before making any changes. Associated keywords for this card include: power, control, adjustments, manipulation, precision, and change. 

In a reading, the "control knobs" card may indicate a need for you to take control of a situation or make adjustments to achieve your goals. It could also suggest that you are being too controlling and need to take a step back and evaluate your approach. Overall, this card is a reminder that we have the power to shape our circumstances and create the outcomes we desire.
